text: Kacper Oleszczuk (born 15 May 1994 in Pasłęk) is a Polish athlete specialising in the javelin throw. He won the gold medal at the 2015 European U23 Championships. His personal best in the event is 82.29 metres set in Tallinn in 2015. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2011 |World Youth Championships |Lille, France |14th (q) |Javelin throw (800g) |65.85 m |- |2012 |World Junior Championships |Barcelona, Spain |37th (q) |Javelin throw |62.93 m |- |2013 |European Junior Championships |Rieti, Italy |4th |Javelin throw |73.24 m |- |2015 |European U23 Championships |Tallinn, Estonia |bgcolor=gold|1st |Javelin throw |82.29 m |- |2016 |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |8th |Javelin throw |79.34 m |} ==Seasonal bests by year== *2012 - 71.42 *2013 - 75.39 *2014 - 77.46 *2015 - 82.29 *2016 - 80.97 ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male javelin throwers Category:People from Pasłęk pl:Łukasz Grzeszczuk
title: Kacper Oleszczuk
